author: Special Correspondent
text:
Governor K. Rosaiah on Sunday expressed his condolences on the death of former Sikkim Governor V. Rama Rao at a hospital in Hyderabad.

In his condolence message released by the Raj Bhavan, the Governor said, “He fought for the cause of working class and trade unions during the start of his career as a lawyer. He was an active member on the floor of Legislative council and raised several public issues. His death is an irreparable loss to the nation and to the people of Andhra Pradesh, Telangana and Sikkim in particular.”

Mr. Rosaiah also conveyed his deepest condolences to the bereaved members of the family.
title: Governor condoles Rama Rao’s death
